description: Try our easy to follow Baby Gem Lettuce With Blue Cheese & Beetroot recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Green salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Baby Gem Lettuce With Blue Cheese & Beetroot Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put half the cheese, the paprika, yoghurt, and mint in a food processor and whiz to a creamy paste. Crumble in the rest of the cheese and season with salt and black pepper.

Break up the lettuce into leaves, creating at least eight boats, place a couple of slices of beetroot in each, then fill each one with a heaped teaspoon of the cheese mixture. Serve with fresh crusty bread and chorizo.
